[[Image:Love heart uidaodjsdsew.gif|thumb|right|The [[Heart (Symbolism and Metaphor)|heart]], a symbol of love]]
 
[[Image:Love heart uidaodjsdsew.gif|thumb|right|The [[Heart (Symbolism and Metaphor)|heart]], a symbol of love]]
    −
'''Love''' has many meanings in [[English language|English]], from something that gives a little pleasure ("I loved that meal") to something one would die for ([[patriotism]], pairbonding). It can describe an intense feeling of [[affection]], an [[emotion]] or an emotional state. In ordinary use, it usually refers to interpersonal love. Probably due to its psychological relevance, love is one of the most common themes in art. The majority of modern [[film|movies]] have a love story and most [[pop music]] is about love.
+
'''Love''' has many meanings in [[English language|English]], from something that gives a little pleasure ("I loved that meal") to something one would die for ([[patriotism]], pairbonding). It can describe an intense feeling of [[affection]], an [[emotion]] or an emotional state. In ordinary use, it usually refers to interpersonal love. Probably due to its psychological relevance, love is one of the most common themes in art.
